'''The Rhythm that Reveals the Beastly Trail''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Quest Domain]] for {{Quest|The Rhythm that Reveals the Beastly Trail}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Play the [[Vintage Lyre]] in front of the nearby [[Claustroflora]]
# Drop down into the hole
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Whirling Electro Fungus*2;Stretchy Geo Fungus*2;Stretchy Anemo Fungus}}
# Pick up [[Primeval Rosin]] (1/3)
# Proceed onward
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Stretchy Anemo Fungus*2;Stretchy Geo Fungus}}
# Play the Vintage Lyre in front of the nearby Claustroflora
# Use the [[Bouncy Mushroom]] to jump to the upper floor
# Pick up Primeval Rosin (2/3)
# Defeat enemies for a [[Precious Chest]] (optional) {{Enemy List|Floating Dendro Fungus*2;Whirling Electro Fungus}}
# Activate the [[Clusterleaf of Cultivation]] using {{Dendro}}
# Use the [[Four-Leaf Sigil]] to go up
# Complete the [[Valaya|Dendro ring]] puzzle using [[Dendrograna]] from the [[Auspicious Branch]]
# Pick up Primeval Rosin (3/3)
# Drop down one floor through the hole
# Unseal the barrier (requires all 3 Primeval Rosins)
# Proceed to final room
# Defeat enemies
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Floating Dendro Fungus*2;Whirling Cryo Fungus*2;Whirling Electro Fungus;Stretchy Anemo Fungus}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Floating Hydro Fungus*2;Whirling Cryo Fungus*2}}
#** {{Enemy|Winged Cryoshroom|text=Cast Nightmare}} x2
# Exit domain
